name: Reputation Changer Complaints
overview:
To the team at Reputation Changer, complaints posted on the web are a major threat to most businesses and individuals. An online complaint or negative review has a much wider audience than ever before. In most cases, a business owner has no recourse or way to rebut the complaint, no matter how untrue it is. That’s what Reputation Changer is for. The online reputation management company has been helping companies and people suppress negative data online since 2010.

Online reputation management is not a magic wand solution. Reputation Changer uses proven, effective methods to clear a client’s Google search results and to restore a client’s Google auto complete. Even after the initial, desirable results are achieved, Reputation Changer continues to work with clients to monitor their online presence and to make adjustments as needed. A clearing plan from Reputation Changer is ideal for individuals who have been attacked by a blogger or other media figure, or for people who have had a negative write up on one of the many review sites online. The clearing plan also works for people who share the same name as a person who has done bad things.

Reputation Changer works with high profile clients, including doctors and lawyers. It has also helped maintain the reputation of political figures and famous athletes. But online reputation management isn’t just for people with famous names or careers. Anyone who runs a business or who needs to keep an online presence squeaky clean can benefit from the services offered by the company.

As more people use the Internet for business and personal reasons, maintaining a strong and positive online reputation becomes more essential. For example, a potential employer can use social media sites and Google to perform off the cuff research on a possible hire. If that hire hasn’t taken care of her reputation, her chance of landing a job can be shot. In addition to suppressing complaints, Reputation Changer can also provide content for websites and blogs, and establish a social media presence for its clients. With Reputation Changer, clients can make a great first impression online, no matter who searches for them.
